name: Captain Corgo
description:
Captain Corgo Is a retro endless runner type game.
You as Captain Corgo need to go back into his home dimension. For that, you need to Collect 3 Gems and escape from a big mechanic cat-clock. Also, evade a lot of obstacles as fast as you can, before the times run out.

Features:
- Story mode
- Tutorial
- Shop and cosmetics
- Arcade mode
- Game Pad support
